alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; New Haven; New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 7:17PM EDT until July 27 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... New London County in southern Connecticut... Southern Middlesex County in southern Connecticut... Southeastern New Haven County in southern Connecticut... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 716 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sprague to North Lyme to Clinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Norwich and Clinton around 720 PM EDT. Jewett City and Ledyard around 725 PM EDT. New London and Groton around 730 PM EDT. Mystic around 740 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
